thread.title: Salman to host `PRDP's special screening for Madhuri, Bhagyashree
thread.title_full: Salman to host `PRDP's special screening for Madhuri, Bhagyashree

title: Salman to host `PRDP's special screening for Madhuri, Bhagyashree
text: Salman to host `PRDP's special screening for Madhuri, Bhagyashree Saturday, 24 October 2015 (6 minutes ago) * New Delhi , Oct.24 (ANI): Salman Khan is definitely one of those who holds a special place for his female- co stars, as he will be hosting a special screening of his upcoming flick 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' for Madhuri Dixit and former co-star Bhagyashree.* New Delhi, Oct.24 (ANI): Salman Khan is definitely one of those who holds a special place for his female- co stars, as he will be hosting a special screening of his upcoming flick 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' for Madhuri Dixit and former co-star Bhagyashree. The 49-year-old actor, who will return as Prem after a gap of 15 years in a family drama, wanted to show his latest film to both the actresses with whom he had shared screen in the past as Prem. However, no date has been fixed for the screening due to the actor's hectic work schedule. The `Kick` actor has worked with Madhuri in films like' Hum Apke Hain Koun, 'Saajan, 'Hum Tumhare Hain Sanam', 'Dil Tera Aashiq'. While, Bhagyashree had made her debut opposite Salman in 1989 film 'Maine Pyar Kiya'. The upcoming flick of Salman also stars Sonam Kapoor, Neil Nitin Mukesh, Anupam Kher among others and is slated to hit the theaters on November 12, 2015. (ANI)
